30 SPL_DECL1(plLearnHistogram);

33 class PL_DLL_API plLearnHistogram : public plMLLearnObject
34 {
35 public:
37  typedef plVariablesConjunction VarType;
38 
40  plLearnHistogram();
41 
43  explicit plLearnHistogram(const plVariablesConjunction &vars);
44 
47  template <class arrayType>
48  plLearnHistogram(const plVariablesConjunction &vars,
49  arrayType init_freq, plFloat init_weight=PL_ONE)
50  : plMLLearnObject(vars)
51  , freq_((unsigned int)vars.cardinality())
52  , init_freq_(freq_.size())
53  , init_weight_(init_weight)
54  , var_index_(vars)
55  , has_initialization_(true)
56  {
57  total_weight_ = init_weight_;
58  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < freq_.size(); i++)
59  init_freq_[i] = freq_[i] = init_freq[i];
60  }
61 
63  virtual ~plLearnHistogram();
64 
66  void reset();
67 
69  plDistribution get_distribution() const;
70 
75  template<typename T>
76  void get_probability(T *table)const
77  {
78  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
79  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plLearnHistogram::get_probability'");
80 
81  if(total_weight_ != PL_ZERO){
82  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < freq_.size(); ++i) table[i] = freq_[i]/total_weight_;
83  }
84  else{
85  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < freq_.size(); ++i) table[i] = freq_[i];
86  }
87  }
88 
92  template<typename T>
93  void get_probability(std::vector <T> &table)const
94  {
95  table.resize( freq_.size() );
96  get_probability( &(table[0]) );
97  }
98 
103  template<typename T>
104  void get_frequency(T *table)const
105  {
106  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
107  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plLearnHistogram::get_frequency'");
108 
109  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < freq_.size(); ++i) table[i] = freq_[i];
110  }
111 
114  template<typename T>
115  void get_frequency(std::vector <T> &table)const
116  {
117  table.resize( freq_.size() );
118  get_frequency( &(table[0]) );
119  }
120 
123  const std::vector <plFloat> &get_frequency()const{return freq_;}
124 
127  void get_actual_min_max(plValues &min, plValues &max) const;
128 
130  size_t size() const { return freq_.size(); }
131 
132 
133  void get_parameters(plValues &params) const
134  {
135  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
136  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plLearnHistogram::get_parameters'");
137 
138  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < freq_.size(); ++i){
139  params[i] = freq_[i];
140  }
141 
142  }
143 
144  unsigned int get_n_parameters()const
145  {
146  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
147  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plLearnHistogram::get_n_parameters'");
148 
149  return (unsigned int) (freq_.size()-1);
150  }
151 
152  virtual plLearnObject* clone()const
153  {
154  return new plLearnHistogram(*this);
155  }

157 protected:
158 
163  bool internal_addPoint(const plDataValues &point, plFloat weight=PL_ONE);
164 
165  virtual void Output(std::ostream &out) const;
